reg[2:0]state=3'b000;//initialstateisA(3'b000)

always@(posedgeclk)begin
	if(reset==1'b1)begin//ifresetishigh,resettoA(3'b000)
		state<=3'b000;
	endelsebegin//otherwise,transitiontothenextstatebasedonw
		case(state)//currentstateisstateA(3'b000)bydefault,otherstatesarelistedbelow
			3'b000:begin//stateA(3'b000)ifw=0,stayinstateA(3'b000),ifw=1,gotoB(3'b001)
				if(w==1'b0)beginstate<=state;endelsebeginstate<=3'b001;end
			end
			3'b001:begin//stateB(3'b001)ifw=0,gotoC(3'b010),ifw=1,gotoD(3'b011)
				if(w==1'b0)beginstate<=3'b010;endelsebeginstate<=3'b011;end
			end
			3'b010:begin//stateC(3'b010)ifw=0,gotoD(3'b011),ifw=1,gotoE(3'b011)
				if(w==1'b0)beginstate<=3'b011;endelsebeginstate<=3'b011;end
			end
			3'b011:begin//stateD(3'b011)ifw=0,gotoA(3'b000),ifw=1,gotoF(3'b100)
				if(w==1'b0)beginstate<=3'b000;endelsebeginstate<=3'b100;end
			end
			3'b011:begin//stateE(3'b011)ifw=0,gotoD(3'b011),ifw=1,gotoE(3'b011)
				if(w==1'b0)beginstate<=3'b011;endelsebeginstate<=3'b011;end
			end
			3'b100:begin//stateF(3'b100)ifw=0,gotoC(3'b010),ifw=1,gotoD(3'b011)
				if(w==1'b0)beginstate<=3'b010;endelsebeginstate<=3'b011;end
			end
			default:begin//defaultcaseistostayinstateA(3'b000)ifw=0,ortransitiontoB(3'b001)ifw=1
				if(w==1'b0)beginstate<=state;endelsebeginstate<=3'b001;end
			end
		endcase
	end
end

assignz=(state==3'b101||state==3'b110)?1'b1:1'b0;//outputzis1whenthestateisE(3'b101)orF(3'b110),0otherwise

reg[3:0]state=4'b0000;//initialstateisA

always@(posedgeclk)begin//triggeredbypositiveedgeofclk
	if(reset==1)begin//ifresetishigh,resetstatetoA
		state<=4'b0000;//resetstatetoA
	endelsebegin//ifresetislow,transitiontothenextstatebasedoninputw
		case(state)//basecasesoffcurrentstate
			4'b0000:if(w==0)state<=4'b0001;//ifwislow,transitiontoB
					elsestate<=4'b0000;//ifwhishigh,stayinA
			4'b0001:if(w==0)state<=4'b0100;//ifwislow,transitiontoE
					elsestate<=4'b0010;//ifwhishigh,transitiontoC
			4'b0010:if(w==0)state<=4'b0101;//ifwislow,transitiontoF
					elsestate<=4'b0100;//ifwhishigh,transitiontoD
			4'b0100:if(w==0)state<=4'b0001;//ifwislow,transitiontoB
					elsestate<=4'b0000;//ifwhishigh,stayinA
			4'b0101:if(w==0)state<=4'b0010;//ifwislow,transitiontoC
					elsestate<=4'b0100;//ifwhishigh,transitiontoD
			4'b0110:if(w==0)state<=4'b0101;//ifwislow,transitiontoF
					elsestate<=4'b0100;//ifwhishigh,transitiontoD
			4'b0111:if(w==0)state<=4'b0010;//ifwislow,transitiontoC
					elsestate<=4'b0100;//ifwhishigh,transitiontoD
			default:state<=4'b0000;//defaultcase,resetstatetoAifstateisunknown
		endcase//endcaseblockforstatetransitionbasedoninputw
	end//endifblockforresetsignalbeinghighorlow
end//endalwaysblockforstatetransitionbasedonclkedge

assignz=(state==4'b0110||state==4'b0111)?1'b1:1'b0;//outputzis1whenstateisEorF,0otherwise

endmodule

reg[3:0]state=4'b0000;//initializestatetoA

always@(posedgeclk)begin//triggeronpositiveedgeofclk
	if(reset)state<=4'b0000;//resetstatetoAifresetis1
	elsebegin//otherwise,transitiontothenextstatebasedonw
		case(state)//currentstateisstateA,B,C,D,E,Frespectively
			4'b0000:if(w==1'b0)state<=4'b0001;//transitiontoBifw=0
					elsestate<=4'b0000;//elsestayinAifw=1
			4'b0001:if(w==1'b1)state<=4'b0010;//transitiontoDifw=1
					elsestate<=4'b0011;//transitiontoCifw=0
			4'b0010:if(w==1'b1)state<=4'b0000;//transitiontoAifw=1
					elsestate<=4'b0011;//transitiontoEifw=0
			4'b0011:if(w==1'b1)state<=4'b0100;//transitiontoDifw=1
					elsestate<=4'b0101;//transitiontoCifw=0
			4'b0100:if(w==1'b1)state<=4'b0000;//transitiontoAifw=1
					elsestate<=4'b0110;//transitiontoFifw=0
			4'b0101:if(w==1'b1)state<=4'b0100;//transitiontoDifw=1
					elsestate<=4'b0101;//stayinEifw=0
			4'b0110:if(w==1'b1)state<=4'b0000;//transitiontoAifw=1
					elsestate<=4'b0101;//transitiontoCifw=0
		endcase//endofcaseblock
	end//endofelseblock
end//endofalwaysblock

assignz=(state==4'b0101||state==4'b0110)?1'b1:1'b0;//outputzis1whenthestateisEorF,0otherwise

reg[3:0]state=4'bA;//initialstateisA

	if(reset==1'b1)begin//ifresetis1,resetstatetoA
		state<=4'bA;
	endelsebegin//otherwise,transitiontothenextstatebasedonw
		case(state)
			4'bA:begin//stateA
				if(w==1'b0)begin//ifw=0,transitiontoB
					state<=4'bB;
				endelsebegin//ifw=1,stayinA
					state<=4'bA;
				end
			end
			4'bB:begin//stateB
				if(w==1'b1)begin//ifw=1,transitiontoD
					state<=4'bD;
				endelsebegin//ifw=0,transitiontoC
					state<=4'bC;
				end
			end
			4'bC:begin//stateC
				if(w==1'b1)begin//ifw=1,transitiontoD
					state<=4'bD;
				endelsebegin//ifw=0,transitiontoE
					state<=4'bE;
				end
			end
			4'bD:begin//stateD
				if(w==1'b1)begin//ifw=1,transitiontoA
					state<=4'bA;
				endelsebegin//ifw=0,transitiontoF
					state<=4'bF;
				end
			end
			4'bE:begin//stateE
				if(w==1'b1)begin//ifw=1,transitiontoD
					state<=4'bD;
				endelsebegin//ifw=0,stayinE
					state<=4'bE;
				end
			end
			4'bF:begin//stateF
				if(w==1'b1)begin//ifw=1,transitiontoD
					state<=4'bD;
				endelsebegin//ifw=0,transitiontoC
					state<=4'bC;
				end
			end
		endcase
	end
end

reg[2:0]state=3'b000;//initialstateisA

always@(posedgeclk)begin//triggeredwhenclockishigh
	if(reset)begin//ifresetis1,resettoAstate
		state<=3'b000;
	endelsebegin//otherwise,transitiontothenextstatebasedoninputw
		case(state)//currentstateisstateA,B,C,D,E,Frespectively
			3'b000:begin//stateA
				if(w==1'b0)begin//ifinputwislow,transitiontoBstate
					state<=3'b001;//nextstateisB
				endelsebegin//ifinputwishigh,stayinstateA
					state<=3'b000;//nextstateisA
				end
			end
			3'b001:begin//stateB
				if(w==1'b0)begin//ifinputwislow,transitiontoCstate
					state<=3'b010;//nextstateisC
				endelsebegin//ifinputwishigh,transitiontoDstate
					state<=3'b011;//nextstateisD
				end
			end
			3'b010:begin//stateC
				if(w==1'b0)begin//ifinputwislow,transitiontoEstate
					state<=3'b100;//nextstateisE
				endelsebegin//ifinputwishigh,transitiontoDstate
					state<=3'b011;//nextstateisD
				end
			end
			3'b011:begin//stateD
				if(w==1'b0)begin//ifinputwislow,transitiontoFstate
					state<=3'b101;//nextstateisF
				endelsebegin//ifinputwishigh,transitiontoAstate
					state<=3'b000;//nextstateisA
				end
			end
			3'b100:begin//stateE
				if(w==1'b0)begin//ifinputwislow,stayinstateE
					state<=3'b100;//nextstateisE
				endelsebegin//ifinputwishigh,transitiontoDstate
					state<=3'b011;//nextstateisD
				end
			end
			3'b101:begin//stateF
				if(w==1'b0)begin//ifinputwislow,transitiontoCstate
					state<=3'b010;//nextstateisC
				endelsebegin//ifinputwishigh,transitiontoDstate
					state<=3'b011;//nextstateisD
				end
			end
			default:begin//defaultcase,shouldnothappenifcodeiscorrect
				state<=3'b000;//resettoAstateasafallback
			end
		endcase//endofcaseblockforstatetransitionbasedoninputw
	end//endofif(reset)block
end//endofalwaysblockforstatetransitiontriggeredbyclockedge

assignz=(state==3'b100||state==3'b101)?1'b1:1'b0;//outputzis1whenstateisEorF,0otherwise

endmodule

	if(reset==1'b1)begin//ifresetishigh,resetthestatemachine
		state<=3'b000;//resettoinitialstateS
	endelsebegin//ifresetislow,updatethestatemachinebasedoncurrentstateanddatainput
		case(state)//usecasestatementtodefinestatebehaviorbasedoncurrentstateanddatainput
			3'b000:begin//ifcurrentstateisS,updatetoS1ifdataishigh,Sifdataislow
				if(data==1'b1)begin//ifdataishigh,updatetoS1
					state<=3'b001;//updatetoS1state
				endelsebegin//ifdataislow,updatetoS
					state<=3'b000;//updatetoSstate
				end
			end
			3'b001:begin//ifcurrentstateisS1,updatetoS11ifdataishigh,Sifdataislow
				if(data==1'b1)begin//ifdataishigh,updatetoS11
					state<=3'b011;//updatetoS11state
				endelsebegin//ifdataislow,updatetoS
					state<=3'b000;//updatetoSstate
				end
			end
			3'b011:begin//ifcurrentstateisS11,updatetoS11ifdataishigh,S110ifdataislow
				if(data==1'b1)begin//ifdataishigh,updatetoS11
					state<=3'b011;//updatetoS11state
				endelsebegin//ifdataislow,updatetoS110
					state<=3'b010;//updatetoS110state
				end
			end
			3'b010:begin//ifcurrentstateisS110,updatetoDoneifdataishigh,Sifdataislow
				if(data==1'b1)begin//ifdataishigh,updatetoDone
					state<=3'b111;//updatetoDonestate
				endelsebegin//ifdataislow,updatetoS
					state<=3'b000;//updatetoSstate
				end
			end
			3'b111:begin//ifcurrentstateisDone,updatetoDone
				state<=3'b111;//updatetoDonestate
			end
			default:begin//defaultcase,updatetoSifcurrentstateisnotoneoftheabovecases
				state<=3'b000;//updatetoSstate
			end
		endcase//endcasestatementforupdatethestatemachinebasedoncurrentstateanddatainput
	end//endifresetislowblockforupdatethestatemachinebasedoncurrentstateanddatainput
end//endalwaysblockforupdatethestatemachinebasedonrisingedgeofclkorresetsignal

assignstart_shifting=(state==3'b111)?1'b1:1'b0;//assignstart_shiftingbasedoncurrentstateofthestatemachine,highifcurrentstateisDone,lowotherwise

			3'b111:state<=3'b111;//stayinDonestate

				end
			end
			3'b100:begin//Donestate,stayhereuntilresetishigh
				state<=3'b100;
			end
		endcase//endcasestatement
	end//endifblockforreset
end//endalwaysblockforstateupdate

assignstart_shifting=(state==3'b100)?1'b1:1'b0;//outputishighifstateisDone,lowotherwise

reg[2:0]state=3'b000;
reg[3:0]register=4'b0000;

always@(posedgeclkorposedgereset)begin
	if(reset==1)begin
		state<=3'b000;
	endelsebegin
		case(state)
			3'b000:begin
				if(data==1)begin
					state<=3'b001;
				endelsebegin
					state<=3'b000;
				end
			end
			3'b001:begin
				if(data==1)begin
					state<=3'b001;
				endelsebegin
					state<=3'b011;
				end
			end
			3'b011:begin
				if(data==1)begin
					state<=3'b011;
				endelsebegin
					state<=3'b0110;
				end
			end
			3'b0110:begin
				if(data==1)begin
					state<=3'b1110;
				endelsebegin
					state<=3'b000;
				end
			end
			3'b1110:begin
				state<=3'b1110;
			end
		endcase
	end
end

always@(*)begin
	case(state)
		3'b000:begin
			register<=4'b0000;
		end
		3'b001:begin
			register<={data,register[3:1]};
		end
		3'b011:begin
			register<={register[2:0],data};
		end
		3'b0110:begin
			register<={register[1:0],data,register[3]};
		end
		3'b1110:begin
			register<={register[0],data,register[2:1]};
		end
	endcase
end

assignstart_shifting=(state==3'b1110)?1:0;

endmodule

reg[2:0]state=3'b000;//initialstateisS

always@(posedgeclkorposedgereset)begin//updateonrisingedgeofclkorreset
	if(reset==1'b1)begin//resettheStateMachineifresetis1'b1
		state<=3'b000;//initialstateisS
	endelsebegin//ifresetis1'b0,updatetheStateMachinebasedoncurrentstateanddatainput
		case(state)//basecasesoffofcurrentstateofStateMachine
			3'b000:begin//stateS
				if(data==1'b1)begin//ifdatainputis1'b1,transitiontoS1state
					state<=3'b001;//nextstateisS1
				endelsebegin//ifdatainputis1'b0,stayinstateS
					state<=3'b000;//nextstateisS
				end
			end
			3'b001:begin//stateS1
				if(data==1'b1)begin//ifdatainputis1'b1,transitiontoS1state
					state<=3'b001;//nextstateisS1
				endelsebegin//ifdatainputis1'b0,transitiontoS11state
					state<=3'b011;//nextstateisS11
				end
			end
			3'b011:begin//stateS11
				if(data==1'b1)begin//ifdatainputis1'b1,transitiontoS11state
					state<=3'b011;//nextstateisS11
				endelsebegin//ifdatainputis1'b0,transitiontoS110state
					state<=3'b110;//nextstateisS110
				end
			end
			3'b110:begin//stateS110
				if(data==1'b1)begin//ifdatainputis1'b1,transitiontoDonestate
					state<=3'b111;//nextstateisDone
				endelsebegin//ifdatainputis1'b0,transitiontoSstate
					state<=3'b000;//nextstateisS
				end
			end
			3'b111:begin//stateDone
				state<=3'b111;//nextstateisDone
			end
		endcase//endcaseblockforStateMachine
	end//endifblockforStateMachine
end//endalwaysblockforStateMachine

assignstart_shifting=(state==3'b111)?1'b1:1'b0;//outputis1'b1ifStateMachineisinDonestate,otherwiseoutputis1'b0

endmodule

reg[2:0]state=3'b000;//initialstateisS

always@(posedgeclkorposedgereset)begin//updateonrisingedgeofclkorresetsignal
	if(reset==1'b1)begin//resettoinitialstateifresetishigh
		state<=3'b000;//initialstateisS
	endelsebegin//otherwiseupdatestatebasedoncombinationallogicblockoutput
		case(state)//casebasedoncurrentstateofstatemachine
			3'b000:if(data==1'b1)state<=3'b001;//ifdatainputishigh,gotoS1state
					elsestate<=3'b000;//otherwisestayinSstate
			3'b001:if(data==1'b1)state<=3'b011;//ifdatainputishigh,gotoS11state
					elsestate<=3'b000;//otherwisestayinSstate
			3'b011:if(data==1'b1)state<=3'b011;//ifdatainputishigh,gotoS11state
					elsestate<=3'b010;//otherwisegotoS110state
			3'b010:if(data==1'b1)state<=3'b110;//ifdatainputishigh,gotodonestate
					elsestate<=3'b000;//otherwisestayinSstate
			3'b110:if(data==1'b1)state<=3'b110;//ifdatainputishigh,gotodonestate
					elsestate<=3'b000;//otherwisestayinSstate
			default:state<=3'b000;//defaultcaseisSstate
		endcase//endcasebasedoncurrentstateofstatemachine
end//endifblockforupdatingstatemachineonrisingedgeofclkorresetsignal
end//endalwaysblockforupdatingstatemachineonrisingedgeofclkorresetsignal

assignstart_shifting=(state==3'b110)?1'b1:1'b0;//assignoutputbasedoncurrentstateofstatemachine

reg[31:0]q_next=32'h1;//initialvalueofq_nextregisteris32'h1,whichis1inbinaryform.

always@(posedgeclk)begin//qregisterisupdatedontherisingedgeoftheclksignal.
	if(reset==1'b1)begin//ifresetportishigh,qregisterisresettotheinitialvalue,32'h1.
		q<=32'h1;
	endelsebegin//otherwise,qregisterisupdatedwiththevaluestoredintheq_nextregister.
		q<=q_next;
	end
end

always@(*)begin//q_nextregisterisupdatedoneveryclockcycle,andstoresthevalueofqregistershiftedby1bit.
	if(q[0]==1'b1)begin//ifvalueofqregisterisshiftedoutofbit0,itissentbacktobit31.
		q_next={q[31:1],1'b0};	//q_nextregisterstoresthevalueofqregistershiftedby1bit,withbit0being0.
	endelsebegin//otherwise,q_nextregisterstoresthevalueofqregistershiftedby1bit,withbit0being1.
		q_next={q[31:1],1'b1};	//q_nextregisterstoresthevalueofqregistershiftedby1bit,withbit0being1.
	end
end

assignq_next[21]=q[21]^q[0];	//xorbits21and1withthevalueofbit0.
assignq_next[1]=q[1]^q[0];		//xorbits1withthevalueofbit0.
assignq_next[0]=q[0]^q[0];		//xorbit0withthevalueofbit0.

endmodule
